name: Spring Water
description: Pure and refreshing spring water sourced from natural springs. Rich in minerals, it hydrates your body while providing a crisp, clean taste that's perfect for any occasion.

name: Sparkling Water
description: Bubbly sparkling water with a crisp, clean taste. Perfect for those who enjoy a refreshing drink with a little fizz, making it an ideal mixer for cocktails or a delightful standalone beverage.

name: Coca-Cola
description: Classic cola beverage, refreshing and full of flavor. With its unique blend of sweetness and carbonation, Coca-Cola is perfect for quenching your thirst or enjoying with a meal.

name: Pepsi
description: Deliciously bold Pepsi with a unique taste that stands out. Ideal for pairing with snacks, meals, or enjoying on its own for a burst of refreshing flavor.

name: Orange Juice
description: Freshly squeezed orange juice packed with vitamins. Bursting with flavor, it's the perfect way to start your day or enjoy a midday boost of natural energy.

name: Apple Juice
description: Natural apple juice made from ripe apples. Sweet and refreshing, this juice is great for breakfast, as a snack, or as a healthy addition to any meal.

name: Lemonade
description: Refreshing lemonade made with real lemons and just the right amount of sweetness. A classic summer drink that's perfect for picnics, barbecues, or simply enjoying on a hot day.

name: Iced Tea
description: Chilled iced tea with a hint of lemon. A revitalizing drink that combines the smoothness of tea with a refreshing coolness, making it a perfect thirst quencher.

name: Red Wine
description: Rich and bold red wine with fruity notes and a velvety finish. Ideal for pairing with red meats, hearty pasta dishes, or enjoying on its own for a sophisticated experience.

name: White Wine
description: Crisp and refreshing white wine with floral aromas and a smooth finish. Perfect for pairing with seafood, light salads, or as an aperitif for special occasions.

name: Craft Beer
description: Artisanal craft beer with a complex flavor profile. Brewed in small batches, it's perfect for beer enthusiasts looking for unique tastes and character in every sip.

name: Lager
description: Smooth and refreshing lager, with a balanced taste that appeals to everyone. Ideal for social gatherings, BBQs, or simply enjoying a relaxing evening.

name: Ginger Ale
description: Spicy and refreshing ginger ale, a classic mixer. Enjoy it on its own or pair it with your favorite spirits for a zesty cocktail.

name: Tonic Water
description: Crisp tonic water, perfect for cocktails or as a refreshing standalone drink. Its subtle bitterness pairs well with gin and other spirits.

name: Sports Drink
description: Electrolyte-rich sports drink designed to hydrate and replenish. Perfect for athletes and active individuals looking to stay energized and refreshed during workouts.

name: Coconut Water
description: Natural coconut water, a refreshing tropical drink that hydrates and replenishes electrolytes. Perfect for post-workout recovery or a quick refreshment.

name: Root Beer
description: Sweet and creamy root beer, a nostalgic favorite that brings back memories of childhood. Enjoy it on its own or as a float with ice cream.

name: Energy Drink
description: High-energy drink formulated to keep you going all day. Packed with caffeine and vitamins, it's perfect for those needing an extra boost.

name: Smoothie
description: Delicious smoothie made with real fruit and a blend of nutrients. A healthy and tasty option
